companyProfile.companyDescription: HCL Technologies Limited is a technology company. It is engaged in providing a range of information technology (IT) and business services, engineering and research and development (R&D) services and software products and IP-led offerings. Its segments include IT and Business services, Engineering and R&D services, and HCL Software. IT and Business Services segment provide a comprehensive portfolio of IT and Business Services, such as application, infrastructure and digital process operations) and digital transformation services enabled by digital and analytics, IoTWoRKs, Cloud native and Cybersecurity solutions including products developed within these businesses. Engineering and R&D Services provides engineering services and solutions across software, embedded, mechanical, VLSI and platform engineering that support the end-to-end lifecycle of products both hardware and software across diverse industries. HCL Software segment provides modernized software products and IP-led offerings.

recentNews.headline: Infosys CEO Parekh gets 22% pay hike in FY25, stays second-highest paid IT CEO
recentNews.intro: The highest paid IT executive remains HCL Technologies Ltd CEO C. Vijayakumar, according to the company's FY24 annual report. Infosys added nine crorepati employees in FY25.
recentNews.imagecaption: Around  ?49.5 crore of Infosys Ltd CEO Salil Parekh?s compensation came from shares exercised by him in FY25.

recentNews.headline: Tech Mahindra taps US-based exec Santosh Jha to lead GCC push amid industry-wide shift
recentNews.intro: The appointment of Santosh Kumar Jha makes Tech Mahindra the fourth major IT firm to name a head of global capability centres in recent months
recentNews.imagecaption: Tech Mahindra, under chief executive Mohit Joshi, is betting on the GCC business as one of its key growth levers. (File Photo: Mint)

recentNews.headline: The week in charts: Sensex cheer, tariff truce, satellite scheme
recentNews.intro: In this weekly Plain Facts compilation, we present to you data-based insights, with easy-to-read charts, to help you delve deeper into the stories reported by Mint in the week gone by.
recentNews.imagecaption: The Sensex climbed 3.7% to 82,429.90 on Monday, marking its best gains since 1 February 2021. (Image: Pixabay)

recentNews.headline: Stock Picks: Sagar Doshi suggests Adani Energy, HCL Tech, Havells India shares to buy in a green market today - 14 May
recentNews.intro: Stock Picks: Sagar Doshi of Nuvama Professional Clients Group recommends these three stocks today - Adani Energy Solutions Ltd, HCL Technologies Ltd, and Havells India Ltd.
recentNews.imagecaption: Stock Picks: Sagar Doshi suggests Adani Energy, HCL Tech, Havells India shares to buy in a green market today - 14 May

recentNews.headline: Shares to buy or sell: Sachin Gupta of 5paisa recommends L&T, HCL Tech shares today - 13 May 2025
recentNews.intro: Shares to buy or sell: Sachin Gupta of 5paisa has recommended two stocks on Tuesday ? Larsen & Toubro Ltd (L&T), and HCL Technologies Ltd.
recentNews.imagecaption: Shares to buy or sell: Sachin Gupta of 5paisa has recommended two stocks on Tuesday ? Larsen & Toubro Ltd (L&T), and HCL Technologies Ltd.

recentNews.headline: BPO companies can better navigate Gen AI, macro uncertainty than IT cos
recentNews.intro: Part of this is due to the nature of BPO companies' work, which does not depend on clients' non-essential expenditure to earn revenue.
recentNews.imagecaption: Investors in Indian IT stocks are interested only in growth prospects of large and mid-sized software exporters; although Nasscom also captures the performance of pure play BPOs and companies that are set-up by multinationals to provide captive services. Photo: Mint

recentNews.headline: Stock Picks: Sagar Doshi suggests Divis Lab, HCL Tech, Marico shares to buy amid Indo-Pak conflict
recentNews.intro: Stock Picks: Sagar Doshi of Nuvama Professional Clients Group recommends these three stocks today amid Indo-Pak conflict - Divis Laboratories Ltd, HCL Technologies Ltd, and Marico Ltd.
recentNews.imagecaption: Stock Picks: Sagar Doshi of Nuvama Professional Clients Group recommends these three stocks today amid Indo-Pak conflict - Divis Laboratories Ltd, HCL Technologies Ltd, and Marico Ltd.

recentNews.headline: Nifty IT extends falls for 4th straight month in April, posts longest losing streak in nearly a decade
recentNews.intro: Nifty IT index ended April down 3%, marking a four-month losing streak. Seven of ten index constituents, including Coforge and Wipro, saw declines. Despite a recent rebound, the index remains in bear territory, impacted by global trade tensions and cautious forecasts from major IT firms.
recentNews.imagecaption: IT stocks in focus: Nifty IT extends losing streak to 4th straight month in April; longest losing streak in nearly a decade

recentNews.headline: LIC hikes stake in HCL Technologies to 5%. Details here
recentNews.intro: Life Insurance Corporations of India (LIC), on Tuesday, said it has increased its stake in tech firm HCL Technologies from 4.83 per cent to 5 per cent.
recentNews.imagecaption: LIC hikes stake in HCL Technologies to 5%. Details here

recentNews.headline: HCL Technologies share price in focus as stock trades ex-dividend today
recentNews.intro: Stock Market Today: HCL Technologies share price remains in focus on Monday as it trades ex-dividend today. The record date to identify the list of eligible shareholders to receive the dividend also stands as 28 April 2025.
recentNews.imagecaption: Stock Market Today: HCL Technologies record date for dividend today.
